metadata.title: CVE-2024-1669 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds memory access in Blink in Google Chrome prior to122.0.6261.57 allowed a remote attacker to perform out of bounds memoryaccess via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
